description: <Description of this gadget configuration, used for readability only>
moduleKey: <Module key of the gadget, can be null>
moduleKeyCompare: <MATCHES | CONTAINS | BEGINS | ENDS to control how module key is compared>
newModuleKey: <New value of moduleKey. Null to set to null, blank to not change value>
uri: <URI of the gadget, can be null>
uriCompare: <MATCHES | CONTAINS | BEGINS | ENDS to control how uri is compared>
newUri: <New value of uri. Null to set to null, blank to not change value>
configType: <CONFIG or SEPARATE. If CONFIG, the whole Data Center configuration is added to cloud as JSON under 'config' attribute. If SEPARATE, each configuration is added as a separate map entry>
implementationClass: <Class name of CustomGadgetMapper subclass, overrides config>

config.attributeNameRegex: <Regular expression of attribute name, always matches whole string. Note the order of items defines priority>

conditions.attributeName: <Attribute name to check. Not regular expression. Used to check other attributes. Check against original values, not mapped ones>

config.mappingType: <PROJECT|ROLE|USER|GROUP|CUSTOM_FIELD|FILTER|DASHBOARD to indicate what is being mapped. Null to not map value. Target group is the index of capture group to map>
config.pattern: <Regular expression to capture one value to be mapped. Use ^ and $ to match the whole string>
config.prefix: <Prefix to add to the whole value>
config.suffix: <Suffix to add to the whole value>

additions.mode: <APPEND|REPLACE Append or replace attribute value. Append is useful when parent regex has multiple matches>
additions.replacement: <Regular expression replacement. $# refers to parent capture groups>
